statements: SELECT * FROM market_data
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT symbol, volume FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY volume ASC
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM market_data
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM market_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE price < 50;
SELECT MAX(price) FROM MarketData;
SELECT MIN(volume) FROM MarketData WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT strategy_id, description FROM InvestmentStrategies ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price, volume FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, volume, price FROM MarketData WHERE volume < 5000 ORDER BY price ASC, stock_symbol DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price, volume FROM MarketData WHERE volume BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentStrategies WHERE description LIKE '%scalping%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_prices WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT * FROM market_news WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name, last_updated FROM investment_strategies ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM market_news WHERE news_content LIKE '%keyword%';
SELECT id, symbol, price, time FROM market_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM market_news WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01' AND news_title LIKE '%stock%';
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_prices WHERE time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT news_title, news_content FROM market_news ORDER BY publish_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM investment_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT volume, timestamp FROM MarketData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT strategy_id, name, description FROM InvestmentStrategies ORDER BY name;
SELECT symbol, price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT MarketData.symbol, MarketData.price, InvestmentStrategies.name FROM MarketData JOIN InvestmentStrategies ON MarketData.symbol = InvestmentStrategies.name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_adjustments, adjustment_type FROM Adjustments GROUP BY adjustment_type;

SELECT MarketData.symbol, MarketConditions.condition_name FROM MarketData, MarketConditions JOIN Adjustments ON MarketData.symbol = Adjustments.strategy_id AND Adjustments.condition_id = MarketConditions.condition_id;
SELECT * FROM MarketData;
SELECT timestamp, stock_symbol, price FROM TradeOrders WHERE order_type='BUY';
SELECT news_id, headline, content FROM NewsFeed ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_stock_symbol FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_enabled=true;
SELECT stock_symbol, quantity, avg_price FROM Holdings ORDER BY quantity DESC, avg_price;
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, price, volume FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT timestamp, stock_symbol, quantity FROM TradeOrders WHERE order_type = 'buy' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Holdings WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY avg_price ASC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_stock_symbol FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_enabled = true ORDER BY user_id;
